Uses of Interface
com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.InputTransformer

  • Packages that use InputTransformer 
    Package Description
    com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter
    Contains classes which are responsible for eventually converting the number into mapping word combinations.
    com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary
    Contains classes which are primarily responsible for the creation and population of the dictionary.
    com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers
    Contains tranformer contract and other generic transformers which are used to tranform raw numbers and words into words used by dictionary and number converters.

    • Uses of InputTransformer in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter

      Classes in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter that implement InputTransformer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NumberConverterAlgorithm
      This is the one of the core class which is fed with the dictionary and converts a number to a set of matching word combinations.
      The algorithm uses a combination of recursive and iterative approach.
      Constructors in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter with parameters of type InputTransformer 
      Constructor and Description
      NumberConverterAlgorithm(InputTransformer<String> parentTransformer, Dictionary dictionary)
      Constructor to chain it with a parent transformer and initialize with the dictionary which is to be used.
      NumbersConverter(InputTransformer<Set<String>> numberConverterAlgo)
      Initializes with the Number Converter Algorithm object which is used to find matching word combinations for each number string

    • Uses of InputTransformer in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary

      Classes in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary that implement InputTransformer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WordToNumberConverter
      Transforms a word to a number based on the number encoding used to be stored in the dictionary.
      This particular class handles supplementary characters, if there is any in the word, and expects a corresponding mapping provided in the number encoding.
      Ex-> For the below sample encoding, the word CALL and ME gets converted to 2255 and 63 respectively.
      A,B,C -> 2
      D,E,F -> 3
      G,H,I -> 4
      J,K,L -> 5
      M,N,O -> 6
      P,Q,R,S -> 7
      T,U,V -> 8
      W,X,Y,Z -> 9

      Constructors in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary with parameters of type InputTransformer 
      Constructor and Description
      DictionaryFactory(InputTransformer<String> wordConverter)
      Constructs a container object which would be later used to create and populate the dictionary
      HashBasedDictionaryFactory(InputTransformer<String> wordToNumberConverter) 
      WordToNumberConverter(InputTransformer<String> parentTransformer, Map<String,String> numbersEncodingMap)
      Creates an object with numbersEncodingMap and parentTransformer which would be used to convert word to number

    • Uses of InputTransformer in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers

      Classes in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers that implement InputTransformer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StripAndValidateInput
      A transformer class which would strip the unwanted characters from the input, and validate if it contains desired characters only.
      Ex- If the rule says to strip whitespaces and punctuations from the numbers and dictionary words, then corresponding StripAndValidateInput.stripCharsPattern is provided to do the same.
      Once the unwanted characters are removed, StripAndValidateInput.validCharsPattern is used to verify if only desired characters remain
      class  UpperCaseTransformer
      Decorator class which transforms an input string to upper case If there is a parentTransformer provided then first it would use that to do the first level of transformation.
      Constructors in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers with parameters of type InputTransformer 
      Constructor and Description
      UpperCaseTransformer(InputTransformer<String> parentTransformer)
      Constructs with a parent transformer whose output is piped to this class
